Wood.name: Wood
Wood.desc: Just your run of the mill wood used for virtually everything in a crafting aspect.

Potion.name: Potion
Potion.desc: A basic potion, formed with common ingredients. Restores the consumer's HP by 50.

Leather.name: Leather
Leather.desc: Some animal based leather, used for armor related crafting.

MP Potion.name: MP Potion
MP Potion.desc: A basic potion, formed with common ingredients. Restores the consumer's MP by 50.

Bottle of Water.name: Bottle of Water
Bottle of Water.desc: A refreshing, ice cold bottle of water! Nothing better to calm you down after a long day... Unfortunately, it doesn't have much of a purpose in battle, restoring 5HP and 5MP.

Splen Berry.name: Splen Berry
Splen Berry.desc: A typical berry you find all throughout Yaretza, yet it does many wonders on its own to heal 75 hp.

Corsela Berry.name: Corsela Berry
Corsela Berry.desc: Common berry often growing on the trees of Yaretza. Used in many potions! Restores 20MP to the consumer.

Golsa Berry.name: Golsa Berry
Golsa Berry.desc: A common yet also hidden berry amongst the trees that heals your wounds and rejuvenates your magic. Restores HP and MP by 35.
